bill.title: Income tax; sales of certain interests in certain business entities are gain and include certain dividend income in gross income.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 27-7-9, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That Sales Of Certain Interests In Financial Institutions Domiciled In Mississippi, Domestic Corporations, Domestic Limited Partnerships Or Domestic Limited Liability Companies Shall Be Recognized As Gain Under The Income Tax Law Of 1952; To Amend Section 27-7-15, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Include Within The Definition Of Gross Income Under The Income Tax Law Of 1952, Income From Dividends That Has Already Borne A Tax As Dividend Income When The Dividends May Be Specifically Identified In The Possession Of The Recipient; To Amend Section 27-7-17, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity Thereto; And For Related Purposes.
